website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy on-camera light that comes with some nice extras that many other lights don't have.
pros: Includes a travel charger and a waterproof hard carrying case
Light can be dimmed down to 10% depending on what you need
Produces a very bright light at the top brightness
cons: Battery life isn't great and doesn't come with a wall plug

customer_reviews.title: Great LED light to add to the aresenal.
customer_reviews.text: The limo Studio 176 pcs light comes with a stylish carrying case as well as two covers. One clear and the other orange/brown in color. What I dig about this light is that it comes with a battery and charger. Most other lights use batteries and chargers that comes with the unit or require you to change out batteries! This is all in one. What I disliked about this is that even thought you can co trip the brightness (10-99) you can't control the color it puts out. 4 star for that as the light is sometimes to harsh even with filter in place
customer_reviews.author: Great Deals Today USA

customer_reviews.title: 2 months old. Battery dies within minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for face to face interviews where there is low light. Had this for about 2 months. Used it indoors at a hotel for an interview. In the middle of the interview, the light turns off. The battery was fully charged the night before. It was as if the battery was dead. I found that if I put the battery pack back on the charging dock and put it back on the light it would work again. It’s like the battery needs a jumpstart. Besides the battery issue or perhaps I’ve gotten a faulty battery pack, this product is a great light source to compensate for your camera.
customer_reviews.author: JeanBookNerd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light for more uses than you can think now.
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this light for a homemade photo booth at our wedding. I bought two extra batteries but only used one as it lasted all night. This light is very bright and can even be dimmed. I used it last weekend as a camping light and it is was awesome for this. I also used it for light when my neighborhood recently experienced a 24 hour outage. My neighbors asked me later if I had a generator to be able to have the lights so bright in my house during it! It seriously confused them how our house still had lights on!
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoDawg

customer_reviews.title: It works well, but would be significantly more valuable ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but would be significantly more valuable if it came with an adapter to plug into the wall right out of the box. The battery doesn't last long and the case doesn't have room for spares, so bringing a plugin cable would give a backup option. Otherwise works well, I have been primarily using it with my Hero 5 Black Edition onwith a Rode mic. Works well for cutting down the low-light graininess.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Like most of the others in the price range
customer_reviews.text: Solid light. Like most of the others in the price range. The case is nice and the battery fits well. It also comes with a battery which is a plus. The "volume" knob to turn it up or down is a bit wonky in that you have to make about 20 turns to go from 99 to 10 which seems off. Overall, a decent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Golfer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice and bright light
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and bright light. You will have to buy a mini-ball head mount for this item. The one it comes with is cheap plastic and it wobbles the light which is not good for video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using the filters is a great idea as the LEDs are very bright at highest ...
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised. I use as a small studio light for web casts. Using the filters is a great idea as the LEDs are very bright at highest setting. The brightness is variable and can be adjusted via thumb wheel. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Adams

customer_reviews.title: From what I tested out so far it's a nice product, I will being testing more for wedding ...
customer_reviews.text: From what I tested out so far it's a nice product, I will being testing more for wedding low light and VIP party scenery later and update review good for up to 5 feet in a low light environment but dont try to film pass that with zoom great for clubs not great for on-set lighting know your limits
customer_reviews.author: SpitSHot

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Convenience at a convenient price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice as a a backup and extremely convenient. Battery last about 75 minutes or so. Make sure you buy a few backups. Fast shipping and packaging was perfect and product as expected. Would buy again. Good job guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light, use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this particular light quite a bit. It produces a good 5000k temperature and works for a good amount of time on one battery. I would have bought two but at the time I purchased this, I ordered one of another type and that one sucked. This one rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Falsely advertised, too cheap to be a decent light. There's a reason these on camera LEDs are so expensive!
customer_reviews.text: The item I received from this company was completely different than pictured. The mount was shipped broken and looks to have either been poorly cast and dropped or was already used extensively. The light itself had a cheap 4 position sliding switch instead of the pictured rotary knob. Avoid this item.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is a camera-type battery that I can recharge! It is super bright, but is able to be dimmed. I love that it comes with a carrying case. I used this product for a year, and decided I needed two, so I ordered another. I use them for back lighting at wedding dancers.
customer_reviews.author: Design84

customer_reviews.title: Only a one time wonder! :-(
customer_reviews.text: Only good for the first use, been trying to charge the battery ever since. Tried charging it for a few hours, still it was showing battery as low, then charged it for a night, connected back and still it showed battery was low, tried charging for 24 hours, still battery is low. Attached photo is after charging it for 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Moodiesingh

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice unit to go on your DSLR or any camera with a shoe. It output enough light for both the subject and a green screen. I may buy a couple more for my portable set up.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Frison

customer_reviews.title: Really bright but it dims
customer_reviews.text: So far im loving the light. I mostly use it on the dim setting but its great to know that it can be really bright as well. The battery it comes with seems to last a really long time as well so thats a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chaos

customer_reviews.title: DOA - wouldn't work
customer_reviews.text: DOA - Unit didn't fire up. Power indicated setting on the back and functioned as it should but the leds would not start. I have another brand light that's similar and was hoping I'd like this one but I guess I'll stick with the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Warehouse Did Not Properly insure it Worked
customer_reviews.text: Did not function. I placed the battery in the light and there was a quick display of light then nothing at all. The number indicator showed once pressing the power dail, they that too was malfunctioning. Very disappointed really needed this light I purchased for a shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last long
customer_reviews.text: I wonder how many users were able to review after using this product for a while. I charged and used the light once when I tried to recharge it after a few months, it caused a spark and then the battery didnt charge again. All this was in less than 4 months and of course the seller refused to take it back. Please check warranty on this.
customer_reviews.author: Dushyant

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality. The carrying case is a little rough around the zipper in terms of quick access, but just go slow, or tear it open and forget about it, the light is what matters, and its great.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything as advertised. I bought three lights to tape my auditions. They replaced box lights with better light and take up a lot less room in my home studio.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Green

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product it is very bright and low that you ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product it is very bright and low that you can adjust the brightness ! everything works great if you shoot video in low light conditions such as important parties weddings and other events! Comes with amazing traveling case !
customer_reviews.author: Vicente

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as bright as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Rexine Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect the case fits everything great! The light is nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: JuliusPhotography

customer_reviews.title: Works great and received fast
customer_reviews.text: Works great and received fast. Very pleased with the quality and product they described, you get exactly what they offer!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, is great
customer_reviews.text: It works much better than I expected. The battery is very stron. The lighting is very good. A great support for my videos, even for the chroma key.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Bozzetto

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR
customer_reviews.text: Im a wedding videographer and Ive veen needing a light for indoor weddings, and this is beyond what I was looking for. Not only is the light fantastic, but it has a rechargable battery!!! This takes alot of juice, so you definitely need it. Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever works better than ever experienced. Everything looks good. Order it.
customer_reviews.author: NMTX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great value - surprised at the quality for the price. Will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S.

customer_reviews.title: It works great for our photos
customer_reviews.text: This light was very bright and can be dimmed as well. It works great for our photos!
customer_reviews.author: Vandussa

customer_reviews.title: Possibly good
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the light kit I was extremely impressed. It was super bright and the battery was good for a while. Unfortunately it did not fire up on the first recharge . Not sure if I just got a bum light/Battery or these things just suck.
customer_reviews.author: victor valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: This light is really good when it comes to close up filmmaking
customer_reviews.text: This light is really good when it comes to close up filmmaking. At lease in my field of work which is filming music videos at night mostly the LED Light has become an important gear in my camera bag and line of work
customer_reviews.author: Edward Guidos

customer_reviews.title: Bad bag/horse shoe
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in as seen in picture the light is very good now the bag broke apart the stitched handle wasn't stitched right and fell out of my hand can I get new bag??? The horse shoe wobbles with the light on the camera what do I do ? Should I return everything?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. The light is good for close ups. The rechargeable battery makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive the hard cary case or the temperature correctors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The lamp has worked as expected so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Took me a minute to figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Took me a minute to figure out that you have to hold the power button. But other than that it works perfect. Carrying case is a definit plus.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is just as described and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Hazmanyah

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic light. Very versatile with what you can use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic light. Very versatile with what you can use it for and the dimmer knob makes it even more versatile. Not just for videographers! As a photographer, there are so many situations I use this light.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Haws

customer_reviews.title: Much needed for me! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and it works great with the dimmer. I love the rechargeable battery it comes with too instead of having to use AA's! I don't understand what there is to complain about. The color that the light gives off is fine with me. If it bothers you, the light color is easily fixable in post production or even picture style or white balance on the camera itself. Overall, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: Damn this light is pretty bright. I use it with my sony nex and the videos look much brighter. Its easy to turn on, dim or rause the amount of light and very simple to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Truese

product_meta.title: LimoStudio 176 pcs LED Light for DSLR Camera Camcorder Continuous Light, Battery and Charger, Hard Carry Case Photography Photo Video Studio, AGG1830
product_meta.description:
176 pcs LED Continuous Light for Digital Camera/Camcorder Video 
LED 176 PCS LED lights are luminous, add a bigger brightness, the quality of it lasts longer, and gives off a more natural light. 
It also eliminates the cause of red eye, and will give you a more sharper image. 
- PT-176 Model 
- Light Source: 45 degree ultra bright 
- Output Power : 11w 
- Luminous Flux: 1320 LM - 660LM/1320LM (4400K) 
- LED Quantity: 176 PCS 
- Color Temperature: 3200/5600K - 3200-5600/4400K 
- Dimmer: 10%-100% 
- Life Time: 50000h 
- Lithium Battery Type: NP-F550/750/970 
- DC Power Input: DC6.5-17V 

Battery for Video Light (NP-F550 to NP-F950)
High energy density, long life Rechargeable Li-lon battery. 
Voltage : 7.2V 
Capacity : 2500mAH 
Dimensions : 2.76 x 1.50 x 0.79 inch (L x W x H) 
Cell type : Lithium Ion 

Travel charger
Input AC 100V-240V 50/60 Hz, Output DC 4.2(8.4V) 600mAH

Hard Carry Case
5.5 x 6.7 x 2.3 in
Perfectly sized for basic GoPro equipment
Great features for travel and storage
Water resistant exterior fabric protects the equipment from any weather situation
feature_bullets: Contents: (1) x 176PCS LED for Digital Camera/Camcorder Video
(1) x Battery for Video Light (NP-F550 to NP-F950)
(1) x Travel charger : Input AC 100V-240V 50/60 Hz, Output DC 4.2(8.4V) 600mAH

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
